description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Shoot you way along the way of the exploding balls. Don't let any hit you else it's game over. Move left/right in/out with one thumb-stick and push forward with the other to shoot at the oncoming spheres. Compete against a buddy to see who can rack up the most points.
description.short: Shoot you way along the way of the exploding balls. Don't let any hit you else it's game over. Move left/right in/out with one thumb-stick and push forward with the other to shoot at the oncoming spheres. Compete against a buddy to see who can rack up the most points.
